definition: hypo (loanword)/sodium thiosulfate Na2S2O3 used in fixing photos (formerly hyposulfite)/wave (sea)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The nearby world of Hypori was another.
sentences.chinese: 臨近的海波里星是另一個。

sentences.english: Pour ingredients into a highball blass over ice. Stir, garnish and serve.
sentences.chinese: 將所有原料入盛有冰塊的海波杯，攪合，裝飾。

sentences.english: The infinite sky is motionless overhead and the restless water is boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 頭上是靜止的無垠的天空，不寧的海波奔騰喧鬧。

sentences.english: I am thrilled that Hyperion , the publishing arm of Disney, will be publishing the book.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興迪斯尼的海波公司將出版這本書。

sentences.english: Hai Qing and Huang Haibo will bring us a short sketch.
sentences.chinese: 海清和黃海波會給我們帶來一個小品。

sentences.english: The sun glistened on the sand, and the sea waves broke waywardly.
sentences.chinese: 太陽照耀在沙地上，海波任性地浪花四濺。

sentences.english: Quivering within the wave's intenser day.
sentences.chinese: 在烈日之下的海波中輕輕地震顫。

sentences.english: When Ocean shrouds and sepulchres our dead.
sentences.chinese: 當海波覆蓋和收殮我們的死人。

sentences.english: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir. Serve with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 混合所有原料入盛有冰塊的海波杯，攪合，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Yu Haibo's hard work in Shenzhen was rewarded.
sentences.chinese: 餘海波在深圳的努力得到了回報。

sentences.english: Combine ingredients in a highball glass over crushed ice. Stir & serve.
sentences.chinese: 混合阿所有原料入盛有冰塊的海波杯，攪合如玻璃杯。

sentences.english: A million years ago, molten magma explosively burst above the waves.
sentences.chinese: 一百萬年前，熔化的岩漿在海波之上爆發性噴發出來。

definition: same as 渤海[Bo2 Hai3], Bohai Sea between Liaoning and Shandong/Gulf of Zhili or Chihli
